member.name: T:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator
member.summary: Represents a source generator that copies the whole method, and replaces some variables with cached fields.

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.InterceptsLocationAttributeSourceCode
member.summary: Indicates the raw source code for intercepts location attribute.

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.Initialize(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IncrementalGeneratorInitializationContext)
member.remarks: This generator will aim to methods, to find whether a method block contains at least one intercepted usage. If so, such method will be replaced with cached method. The requirement is that, the callee method should be applied with '[InterceptorMethodCaller]'.

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.Descriptor_Interceptor0100
member.summary: Represents message "Necessary type is missing".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.Descriptor_Interceptor0101
member.summary: Represents message "Method marked '[InterceptorMethodCaller]' can only be block body".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.Descriptor_Interceptor0102
member.summary: Represents message "Method marked '[InterceptorMethodCaller]' requires at least one invocation expression that references to a method marked '[Cached]'".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.Descriptor_Interceptor0103
member.summary: Represents message "Method marked '[Cached]' cannot be ".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.Descriptor_Interceptor0104
member.summary: Represents message "Lacks of usage of necessary comments: 'VARIABLE_DECLARATION_BEGIN' and 'VARIABLE_DECLARATION_END'".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.Descriptor_Interceptor0105
member.summary: Represents message "Duplicate comments: 'VARIABLE_DECLARATION_BEGIN' and 'VARIABLE_DECLARATION_END'".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.Descriptor_Interceptor0106
member.summary: Represents message "If method is marked '[Cached]', it is disallowed to consume instance members by using or ".

member.name: T:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.TransformResult
member.summary: Represents a transform result.
member.param: Indicates whether the result describes for "successful".

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.TransformResult.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Represents a transform result.
member.param: Indicates whether the result describes for "successful".

member.name: P:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.TransformResult.Success
member.summary: Indicates whether the result describes for "successful".

member.name: T:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.SuccessTransformResult
member.summary: Represents a transform result after successfully to be handled.

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.SuccessTransformResult.#ctor(System.String,Sudoku.SourceGeneration.InterceptedLocation)
member.summary: Represents a transform result after successfully to be handled.

member.name: P:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.SuccessTransformResult.Text
member.summary: Indicates the source text generated.

member.name: P:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.SuccessTransformResult.Location
member.summary: Indicates the location information.

member.name: T:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.FailedTransformResult
member.summary: Represents a transform result after failed to be handled.

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.FailedTransformResult.#ctor(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostic)
member.summary: Represents a transform result after failed to be handled.

member.name: P:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.FailedTransformResult.Diagnostic
member.summary: The diagnostic result.

member.name: T:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodSyntaxRewriter
member.summary:
Represents a syntax rewriter that will:
Remove declarations declared between comments 'VARIABLE_DECLARATION_BEGIN' and 'VARIABLE_DECLARATION_END'
Append extra parameter @this if it is an instance method
Replace references to parameter @this references
member.param: Indicates the bound semantic model of this syntax tree.
Indicates the cancellation token that can cancel the current operation.

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodSyntaxRewriter.#ctor(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SemanticModel,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
Represents a syntax rewriter that will:
Remove declarations declared between comments 'VARIABLE_DECLARATION_BEGIN' and 'VARIABLE_DECLARATION_END'
Append extra parameter @this if it is an instance method
Replace references to parameter @this references
member.param: Indicates the bound semantic model of this syntax tree.
Indicates the cancellation token that can cancel the current operation.

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodSyntaxRewriter.VisitParameterList(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.ParameterListSyntax)
member.summary: Changing code by adding a new parameter this TypeName @this to the parameter list if the referenced method is an instance method.

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodSyntaxRewriter.VisitIdentifierName(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.IdentifierNameSyntax)
member.summary: Changing code by updating expression MemberName to @this.MemberName if MemberName is an instance member.

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodSyntaxRewriter.VisitMemberAccessExpression(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.MemberAccessExpressionSyntax)
member.summary: Changing code by updating expression this.MemberName to @this.MemberName, or base.MemberName to ((BaseType)@this).MemberName.

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodSyntaxRewriter.VisitInvocationExpression(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.InvocationExpressionSyntax)
member.summary: Changing code by updating expression MemberName(parameters) to @this.MemberName(parameters).

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodSyntaxRewriter.VisitElementAccessExpression(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.ElementAccessExpressionSyntax)
member.summary: Changing code by updating expression this[parameters] to @this[parameters], or base[parameters] to ((BaseType)@this)[parameters].

member.name: T:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.InterceptedLocation
member.summary: Represents location information for an intercepted method.
member.param: Indicates the file path of the target method.

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.InterceptedLocation.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Represents location information for an intercepted method.
member.param: Indicates the file path of the target method.

member.name: P:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.InterceptedLocation.FilePath
member.summary: Indicates the file path of the target method.

member.name: P:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.InterceptedLocation.Line
member.summary: Indicates the line number.

member.name: P:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.InterceptedLocation.Character
member.summary: Indicates the character position.

member.name: T:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.StepSearcherDefaultImportingGenerator
member.summary: Represents a source generator type that runs multiple different usage of source output services on compiling code.

member.name: T:SolutionVersion
member.summary: Represents the data that describes the version used in the project or solution.

member.name: F:SolutionVersion.Value
member.summary: Indicates the version value represented as a value.
